text: Ninan Koshy (; 1 February 1934 â€“ 4 March 2015) was an Indian political thinker, foreign affairs expert, Christian theologian and social analyst. He was born in 1934 in Thiruvalla. He was a former director of the WCC's Commission of the Churches on International Affairs. Koshy died in Thiruvananthapuram on 4 March 2015, aged 81. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Christian theologians Category:Politicians from Kerala Category:Indian Christians
title: Ninan Koshy
